text: Viorel Turcu (9 August 1960 – 29 November 2020) was a Romanian footballer. He played as a midfielder. He was born in Popești, Romania. Turcu made seven appearances for the national team in 1982. Turcu died on 29 November 2020 in Piatra Neamț, Romania at the age of 60.A murit Voirel Turcu! Helmut Duckadam, cu ochii plini de lacrimi: ”Șunt șocat! Vorbisem să ne vedem la un ceaun!” ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Romanian footballers Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Viorel Turcu
